name: Trashed (schwizzlers)
description: You’re at a normally-reclusive warlock’s house party to celebrate her 304th birthday but the warlock forgot to mention her trashcans are actually portals to an endless void because that way she never has to take out the trash. You had a little too much to drink and slip on someone’s wand and accidentally fall into a trashcan and now you have to find your way out before the party ends and the warlock teleports her condo halfway across time & space.
